name: Time Traveller (Mindscape)
overview: This game was a stand alone game and part of a 3 game pack that came with the Light Gun Fantastic bundle, the game bundle consisted of games by Mindscape, Time Traveller, Army Days, Gangster Town. The computer games collection Commodore C64 Light Fantastic by the company Commodore was sold in England with a C64C, including Cheetah Defender 64 Light gun and an Annihilator Joystick and 3D-glasses in 1990.
